{"id":1035841811,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 weeks, 1 day","timestamp":1693388959,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"25 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1035841811/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Largest Positive Integer That Exists With Its Negative","memory":"19.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxK(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        for (auto i = nums.end() - 1; i >= nums.begin(); i--) {\n            if (find(nums.begin(), nums.end(), -*i) != nums.end())\n                return *i;\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"largest-positive-integer-that-exists-with-its-negative","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
